name: countdown-reminder
description: Countdown Reminder - countdowns and reminders for special dates

scripts.dev:electron: wait-on dist/main/preload.js dist/main/main.js dist/renderer/index.html dist/renderer/widget.html && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.build: npm run build:renderer && npm run build:main
scripts.pack:win: npm run builder:clean-output && npm run build && cross-env ELECTRON_BUILDER_CACHE=.cache/electron-builder electron-builder --win --x64 --dir
scripts.dist:win: npm run builder:clean-output && npm run build && cross-env ELECTRON_BUILDER_CACHE=.cache/electron-builder electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.dist:debug: npm run builder:clean-output && npm run build && cross-env DEBUG=electron-builder,electron-builder:* ELECTRON_BUILDER_CACHE=.cache/electron-builder electron-builder --win --x64 --publish=never
